article_title: '60 Minutes' Stumbles On How Health Insurance Works

article_metadata.author: Dan Munro

og.description: Sunday night's interview of Steven Brill by Leslie Stahl on 60 Minutes was much anticipated in large part because of Brill's new book ‒ America's Bitter Pill. Brill was on the circuit and had appeared on other talk shows (including Jon Stewart's The Daily Show here) earlier in the week. The [...]
